plot: This Sportscope short features the sport of kayaking. Participants ride river rapids and show their skill as they maneuver through special 'water slalom' courses.
title: Wild Water
plot_es: This Sportscope short features the sport of kayaking. Participants ride river rapids and show their skill as they maneuver through special 'water slalom' courses.
plot_en: This Sportscope short features the sport of kayaking. Participants ride river rapids and show their skill as they maneuver through special 'water slalom' courses.
